Plot: In the wake of two back-to-back mass murders on Chico's frat row, loner Brent Chirino must infiltrate the ranks of a popular fraternity to investigate his twin brother's murder at the hands of the serial killer known as "Motherface."
Title: Dude Bro Party Massacre III
Writer: Alec Owen (screenplay), Jon Salmon, Michael E. Peter, Ben Gigli, Timothy Ciancio, Michael Rousselet, Tomm Jacobsen, Joey Scoma, Mike James, Brian Firenzi
Director: Tomm Jacobsen, Michael Rousselet, Jon Salmon
Actors: Alec Owen, Patton Oswalt, Paul Prado, Brian Firenzi
